TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumericUpDown extends System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class NumericUpDown Inherits UpDownBase Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 代表可顯示數值的 Windows 微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項)。

span.span: Represents a Windows spin box (also known as an up-down control) that displays numeric values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項包含單一數值可以遞增或遞減按一下向上或向下按鈕的控制項。A control contains a single numeric value that can be incremented or decremented by clicking the up or down buttons of the control. 除非使用者也可以在 [值] 輸入屬性設定為`true`。The user can also enter in a value, unless the property is set to `true`. 可以藉由設定格式化的數字顯示， ，或屬性。The numeric display can be formatted by setting the , , or properties. 若要顯示在控制項中的十六進位值，設定屬性`true`。To display hexadecimal values in the control, set the property to `true`. 若要顯示千分位分隔符號十進位數字在適當的情況下，設定屬性`true`。To display a thousands separator in decimal numbers when appropriate, set the property to `true`. 指定顯示的數字的小數符號之後，請設定要顯示的小數位數的屬性。To specify the number of digits displayed after the decimal symbol, set the property to the number of decimal places to display. 指定之控制項的值的容許範圍，請設定和屬性。To specify the allowable range of values for the control, set the and properties. 設定值，以指定的值會遞增或遞減至屬性當使用者按一下向上或向下箭號按鈕。Set the value to specify the value to be incremented or decremented to the property when the user clicks the up or down arrow buttons. 您可以增加控制項移動透過數字時，使用者持續按下向上或向下箭號設定的速度屬性。You can increase the speed that the control moves through numbers when the user continuously presses the up or down arrow by setting the property. 當或方法會呼叫、 程式碼中或按一下向上或向下按鈕，驗證新值和控制項也會更新以新的值，以適當的格式。When the or methods are called, either in code or by the click of the up or down buttons, the new value is validated and the control is updated with the new value in the appropriate format. 具體來說，如果屬性設定為`true`、方法呼叫之前驗證或更新值。Specifically, if the property is set to `true`, the method is called prior to validating or updating the value. 然後確認值介於和值，而方法呼叫。The value is then verified to be between the and values, and the method is called. 從.NET Framework 4.6 開始將會根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目調整控制項的大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, the control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制設定的某些常見的屬性和可讓使用者在執行階段變更其中一些屬性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此程式碼假設三個控制項放置在表單和處理常式，如其事件具現化。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，和屬性會設事件的每個核取方塊。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. [!code-cpp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Accelerations As NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection

summary.span: 取得 控制項的排序加速物件之集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of sorted acceleration objects for the control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項的排序加速物件。

span.span: A containing the sorted acceleration objects for the control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以用來增加的速度透過大量數字在使用者保留向上或向下箭號，使用鍵盤或滑鼠移動。The property can be used to increase the speed with which the moves through a large set of numbers when the user holds the up or down arrow, either with the keyboard or with the mouse. 設定這個屬性會減少數取決於所發生的事件和針對每個指定的屬性值集合中的物件。Setting this property will decrease the number of events that occur depending on the and property values specified for each object in the collection. 集合中包含的物件會依照其屬性。The objects contained in the collection are sorted by their property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`InitializeAcceleratedUpDown`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call the `InitializeAcceleratedUpDown` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 執行程式碼時，按下並按住向上或向下箭號，若要查看發生的加速。While the code is running, press and hold the up or down arrow to see the acceleration occur. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/VB/form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 取得或設定在微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 中顯示的小數位數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of decimal places to display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).

value.span: 在微調方塊中顯示的小數位數。

span.span: The number of decimal places to display in the spin box.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定屬性，則呼叫方法來更新微調方塊顯示成新格式。When the property is set, the method is called to update the spin box's display to the new format. 適當的小數符號取決於使用者的作業系統的地區設定。The appropriate decimal symbol is determined by the regional settings of the user's operating system. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制設定的某些常見的屬性和可讓使用者在執行階段變更其中一些屬性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此程式碼假設三個控制項放置在表單和處理常式，如其事件具現化。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，和屬性會設事件的每個核取方塊。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. summary.span: 取得或設定當按一下向上或向下按鈕時，會遞增或遞減微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的數值。

value.span: 當按一下微調方塊的向上或向下按鈕時，會遞增或遞減 屬性的數值。

span.span: The value to increment or decrement the property when the up or down buttons are clicked on the spin box.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下向上按鈕會導致屬性所指定的數量遞增屬性和方法屬性。Clicking the up button causes the property to increment by the amount specified by the property and approach the property. 按一下向下按鈕會導致屬性會依指定的數量減少屬性和方法屬性。Clicking the down button causes the property to be decremented by the amount specified by the property and approach the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制設定的某些常見的屬性和可讓使用者在執行階段變更其中一些屬性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此程式碼假設三個控制項放置在表單和處理常式，如其事件具現化。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，和屬性會設事件的每個核取方塊。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項接受只有數字、 負號、 小數點和編輯按鍵，例如退格鍵。The control accepts only digits, the negative sign, the decimal point, and editing keystrokes, such as BACKSPACE. 如果屬性設定為`true`，接受十六進位數字。If the property is set to `true`, accepts hexadecimal digits.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::Padding Padding { System::Windows::Forms::Padding get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::Padding value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定介於 控制項邊緣與其內容之間的空格。

span.span: Gets or sets the space between the edges of a control and its contents.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性不會影響的外觀控制項。Setting the property as no effect on the appearance of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PaddingChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 會在 屬性的值變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void ParseEditText() cil managed

summary.span: 將微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 中所顯示的文字轉換為數值，並加以評估。

span.span: Converts the text displayed in the spin box (also known as an up-down control) to a numeric value and evaluates it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，顯示的文字會轉換為數值，讓它可以驗證必須介於和屬性值。If the property is set to `true`, the text displayed is converted to a numeric value so it can be validated to be between the and property values.

Public Overrides Property Text As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要在 控制項中顯示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to be displayed in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的外觀會有任何作用控制; 因此，它隱藏在設計工具，以及從 IntelliSense。The has no affect on the appearance of the control; therefore, it is hidden in the designer and from IntelliSense.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TextChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 會在 屬性的值變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ThousandsSeparator { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在適當的時候是否在微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 顯示千位分隔符號。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a thousands separator is displayed in the spin box (also known as an up-down control) when appropriate.

value.span: 如果在適當的時候於微調方塊顯示千位分隔符號則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a thousands separator is displayed in the spin box when appropriate; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定屬性，則呼叫方法來更新微調方塊顯示成新格式。When the property is set, the method is called to update the spin box's display to the new format. 適當的千位分隔符號取決於使用者的作業系統的地區設定。The appropriate thousands separator is determined by the regional settings of the user's operating system. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制設定的某些常見的屬性和可讓使用者在執行階段變更其中一些屬性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此程式碼假設三個控制項放置在表單和處理常式，如其事件具現化。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，和屬性會設事件的每個核取方塊。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. [!code-cpp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

A string that represents the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回字串包含類型和值和屬性。The return string includes the type and the values for the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void UpButton() cil managed

summary.span: 增加微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的值。

span.span: Increments the value of the spin box (also known as an up-down control).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當方法呼叫、 程式碼中或按一下向上按鈕，驗證新值和控制項也會更新以新的值，以適當的格式。When the method is called, either in code or by the click of the up button, the new value is validated and the control is updated with the new value in the appropriate format. 具體來說，如果設`true`，在驗證或更新值之前呼叫。Specifically, if is set to `true`, is called prior to validating or updating the value. 然後驗證的值必須介於和值和方法呼叫。The value is then validated to be between the and values and the method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void UpdateEditText() cil managed

summary.span: 以適當的格式顯示微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的目前值。

span.span: Displays the current value of the spin box (also known as an up-down control) in the appropriate format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未初始化的微調方塊，目前的值會驗證介於和值，並且會轉換成控制項中顯示正確的格式。If the spin box is not being initialized, the current value is validated to be between the and values and is converted to the correct format for display in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ValidateEditText() cil managed

summary.span: 驗證和更新微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 所顯示的文字。

span.span: Validates and updates the text displayed in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫和方法來驗證和更新微調方塊的顯示。The method calls the and methods to validate and update the display of the spin box.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Decimal Value { System::Decimal get(); void set(System::Decimal value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定指定給微調方塊 (也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 的數值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value assigned to the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
The numeric value of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定，驗證新值必須介於和值。When the property is set, the new value is validated to be between the and values. 接著，呼叫方法來更新微調方塊顯示使用新的值以適當的格式。Following this, the method is called to update the spin box's display with the new value in the appropriate format. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化控制設定的某些常見的屬性和可讓使用者在執行階段變更其中一些屬性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此程式碼假設三個控制項放置在表單和處理常式，如其事件具現化。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. ， ，和屬性會設事件的每個核取方塊。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. [!code-cpp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than the property value.
-or-

exception.span: 指派的值大於 屬性值。

span.span: The assigned value is greater than the property value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ValueChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性已經以某種方式變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property has been changed in some way.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如事件發生，屬性可以變更程式碼中，依序按一下向上或向下按鈕，或由使用者輸入新值，這個控制項所讀取的值。For the event to occur, the property can be changed in code, by clicking the up or down button, or by the user entering a new value that is read by the control. 當使用者按 ENTER 鍵，或移動離開該控制項時，會讀取新的值。The new value is read when the user hits the ENTER key or navigates away from the control. 如果使用者輸入新值，然後按一下 向上或向下按鈕，事件就會發生兩次。If the user enters a new value and then clicks the up or down button, the event will occur twice. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`NumericUpDown1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `NumericUpDown1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#515](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#515)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#515](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#515)]
